title: Red dog!
author: VD
content_html:
Keep your eyes open for a forthcoming blitz on a big Republican figure. I can’t say much more than that right now, but rest assured that the mainstream media is pissed about the election and has its knives out. So much for its “the country must unite” theme, which didn’t even last until the weekend after the election. It doesn’t look like the bloggers vs. media fact-checking war is going to settle down anytime soon.

It will interesting to see if the ABCNNBCBS cabal has learned to be more careful or if they’ll continue to play fast and loose with the truth, hoping that no one will call them on it.
